SEARCH
Package org.sgrewritten.stargate.api.network.portal.formatting

Interface StargateComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdventureStargateComponent, LegacyStargateComponent
public sealed interface StargateComponent permits LegacyStargateComponent, AdventureStargateComponent (not exhaustive)
An interface for text components, meant to support both spigot and adventure text formats.
